title: Gold reserves of global central banks are rising. Should you also accumulate gold?
description:
Central banks are on a buying-spree in the gold market. For the third consecutive year, gold buying by central banks topped 1,000 tonnes. In 2024, central banks purchased a record 1,180 tonnes of gold after buying 1,082 tonnes in 2022 and 1,037 tonnes in 2023.

title: Edinburgh online currency expert spots holiday money boom despite UK media’s derision of Rachel Reeves’ budget
description:
Last week’s Budget may have received a frosty reception from the UK media, but it turns out it has made it cheaper to go abroad for some winter sun.

The British Pound has surged in response, meaning that the thousands of British tourists heading abroad over Christmas will get more bang for their bu...

title: "Deepening India-France economic ties": Piyush Goyal meets French minister Eric Lombard

title: EU lowers 2026 eurozone growth forecast amid global trade risks
description:

The eurozone economy is expected to expand less than previously predicted next year, the European Commission said on Monday, citing risks from international trade and geopolitical tensions.

title: Stock market today: Global shares are mostly lower as investors pin hopes on rate cuts
description: TOKYO : Global shares were trading mixed on Monday, as investors awaited further indications the Federal Reserve might begin cutting interest rates. title: India, France have shared interest focused on friendship: Macron
description:
Ahead of his bilateral meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi in France, President Emmanuel Macron has said that the two countries have a “shared interest” focused on friendship.
